children.subject: 选择“0：LRU置换算法”的同学，请在此处回复。

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
struct Page
{
    int pgnum;
    bool view, dirty;
    Page(){view=dirty=false;pgnum=-1;}
}a[100];
int n = 15, cur=1;
int pgfault = 0;
void work(int pgnum, int write)
{
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; ++i)
        if(a[i].pgnum == pgnum)
        {
            a[i].view = true;
            if(write == 1)
                a[i].dirty = 1;
            return;
        }
    while(true)
    {
        if(a[cur].pgnum == -1)
        {
            a[cur].pgnum = pgnum;
            a[cur].view = true;
            if(write == 1)
                a[cur].dirty = 1;
            break;
        }
        if(a[cur].view == false && a[cur].dirty == false)
        {
            a[cur].pgnum = pgnum;
            a[cur].view = true;
            if(write == 1)
                a[cur].dirty = 1;
            break;
        }
        else if(a[cur].view == false && a[cur].dirty == true)
        {
            a[cur].dirty = false;
        }
        else if(a[cur].view == true && a[cur].dirty == false)
        {
            a[cur].view = false;
        }
        else if(a[cur].view == true && a[cur].dirty == true)
        {
            a[cur].view = false;
        }
        ++cur;
        if(cur > n)
            cur = 1;
    }
    ++pgfault;
}
int main()
{
    srand(time(NULL));
    int cnt = 0;
    work(3, 0);
    work(1, 1);
    work(4, 0);
    work(2, 1);
    work(5, 0);
    work(2, 0);
    work(1, 1);
    work(2, 0);
    work(3, 0);
    work(4, 0);
    printf("%d\n", pgfault);
    for(int i = 1; i <= 100; ++i)
        for(int j = i; j <= min(i+17, 100); ++j)
        {
            work(j, rand()&1);
            ++cnt;
        }
    printf("%d: %d\n", cnt, pgfault);
}

在这个测试用例中（具有很强的空间局部性），页缺失数随页面个数的变化规律：

n=50: 102

n=20: 110

n=17: 316

n=15: 725

n=13: 1110

n=10: 1560

n=8: 1597

可以看到在这个用例中，当分配的页面数量在10到20之间时，页缺失数会随着页面数量有极大的变化。而不在这个范围内时则影响很小。

#include <iostream>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <time.h>
using namespace std;

#define PRESENT_FLAG 0x1
#define VIEW_FLAG 0x2
#define DIRTY_FLAG 0x4
#define TOTAL_TABLE 20

void increase(int &num) {
    num = (num + 1) % TOTAL_TABLE;
}

struct Page_table
{
    int pageNum;
    int flag;

    void set_present() {
        flag |= PRESENT_FLAG;
    }

    void clear_present() {
        flag &= ~PRESENT_FLAG;
    }

    void set_view()
    {
        flag |= VIEW_FLAG;
    }

    void clear_view()
    {
        flag &= ~VIEW_FLAG;
    }

    void set_dirty()
    {
        flag |= DIRTY_FLAG;
    }

    void clear_dirty()
    {
        flag &= ~DIRTY_FLAG;
    }

    bool is_present() {
        return (flag & PRESENT_FLAG);
    }

    bool is_viewed() {
        return (flag & VIEW_FLAG);
    }

    bool is_written() {
        return (flag & DIRTY_FLAG);
    }

    void swap_out() {
        cout << "swap out " << pageNum << endl;
        if(is_written()) {
            cout << "written " << pageNum << endl;
        }
        clear_present();
    }

    int take_in(int pgnum, bool write) {
        cout << "swap in " << pgnum << endl;
        pageNum = pgnum;
        set_present();
        set_view();
        if(write) {
            set_dirty();
        }
        return 0;
    }

    Page_table() {
        pageNum = -1;
        flag = 0;
    }
};

Page_table tables[TOTAL_TABLE];
int cur = 0;
int pg_fault_num = 0;

int visit_page(int pageNum, bool write) {
    for (int i = 0; i < TOTAL_TABLE; i++) {
        if(tables[i].pageNum == pageNum && tables[i].is_present()) {
            tables[i].set_view();
            if (write) {
                tables[i].set_dirty();
            }
            return 0;
        }
    }
    pg_fault_num++;
    int begin = cur;
    while (true) {
        if(!tables[cur].is_present()) {
            tables[cur].take_in(pageNum, write);
            increase(cur);
            return 0;
        }
        increase(cur);
        if (begin == cur) {
            break;
        }
    }
    while (true) {
        if(!tables[cur].is_viewed() && !tables[cur].is_written()) {
            tables[cur].swap_out();
            tables[cur].take_in(pageNum, write);
            increase(cur);
            return 0;
        }
        if (!tables[cur].is_viewed() && tables[cur].is_written()) {
            tables[cur].clear_dirty();
        }
        if (tables[cur].is_viewed() && !tables[cur].is_written()) {
            tables[cur].clear_view();
        }
        if (tables[cur].is_viewed() && tables[cur].is_written()) {
            tables[cur].clear_view();
        }
        increase(cur);
    }
}

int main()
{
    srand(time(NULL));
    int cnt = 0;
    visit_page(3, 0);
    visit_page(1, 1);
    visit_page(4, 0);
    visit_page(2, 1);
    visit_page(5, 0);
    visit_page(2, 0);
    visit_page(1, 1);
    visit_page(2, 0);
    visit_page(3, 0);
    visit_page(4, 0);
    cout << pg_fault_num << endl;
    for(int i = 1; i <= 100; ++i)
    {
        for(int j = i; j <= min(i+17, 100); ++j)
        {
            visit_page(j, rand()&1);
            ++cnt;
        }
    }
    cout << cnt << ":" << pg_fault_num << endl;

    return 0;
}

使用了和张天扬一样的测例，但由于是随机测例，看不出来有没有bug（

n=50: 101

n=20: 103

n=17: 305

n=15: 854

n=13: 1315

n=10: 1580

n=8: 1600
选择“1:改进的clock 页置换算法”的同学，请在此处回复。

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

#define N 100
#define M 4
// 访问页  工作集  当前元素工作集中是否存在
int page[N] = {0, 2, 4, 3, 3, 2, 7, 8, 9, 0, 8, 9};
int work_set[N] = {0}, flag_pre[N] = {0}; 
int set_num = 0;  //工作集大小
int store[M] = {0, 2, 3, 1};

void work_set_window(int t, int delta){  //求解工作集
	set_num = 0;  //构建工作表  初始化
	for(int i = 0; i < N; i++){
		flag_pre[i] = 0;
		work_set[i] = 0;
	}

	for(int i = t - 1; i >= t - delta; i--){
		if(i < 0)
			break;
		if(flag_pre[page[i]] == 0){  //该页未在工作集中
			flag_pre[page[i]] = 1;
			work_set[set_num] = page[i];
			set_num++;
		}
	}	
}

int main(){
	int delta = 4;

	for(int i = 0; i < 12; i++){
		int lack_flag = 0;  //缺页标志 0是 1否
		for(int j = 0; j < M; j++){
			if(page[i] == store[j])
				lack_flag = 1;
		}
		if(lack_flag){
			work_set_window(i, delta);
			cout << i << "  hit" << endl;
			cout << "work_set is ";
			for(int k = 0; k < set_num; k++)
				cout << work_set[k] << " ";
			cout << endl;
			cout << "store is " ;
			for(int k = 0; k < M; k++)
				cout << store[k] << " "; 
			cout << endl;
			continue;  
		}
		else{
			cout << i << "  miss";
 			work_set_window(i, delta);  //求解工作集，准备替换
 			cout << "work_set is ";
 			for(int k = 0; k < set_num; k++)
				cout << work_set[k] << " ";
			cout << endl;
			cout << "store is " ;
			for(int k = 0; k < M; k++)
				cout << store[k] << " ";
			cout << endl;
			int re_flag;
			for(int j = 0; j < M; j++){
				re_flag = 1;  //替换标志 0 失败 1 成功
				for(int k = 0; k < set_num; k++){
					if(store[j] == work_set[k]){
						re_flag = 0;
						continue;
					}
				}
				if(re_flag){
					store[j] = page[i];
					break;
				}

			}
			if(!re_flag)
				for(int j = 0; j < M; j++){
					if(store[j] == work_set[set_num -1])
						store[j] = page[i];
				}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}

选择“2：工作集页置换算法”的同学，请在此处回复。

import sys

work_set = []
access_list = []
threshold = 0

def load(file_name):
    file_object = open(file_name,'r')
    items = file_object.readline().split()
    ans = []
    for item in items:
        ans.append(int(item))
    return ans

if __name__ == "__main__":
    threshold = int(sys.argv[1])
    access_list = load("access_list")
    hit_time = 0
    last_time = 0
    access_time = 0
    for i in access_list:
        print("------Start to access %d------"%i)
        find = 0
        for j in work_set:
            if j[0] == i:
                print("Page Hit!")
                hit_time = hit_time + 1
                j[1] = 1
                find = 1
                break
        if find == 0:
            print("Page Fault!")
            if (access_time - last_time >= threshold):
                print("Start to delete")
                remove_list = []
                for j in work_set:
                    print("Now check %d"%j[0])
                    if j[1] == 0:
                        print("Delete Page %d"%j[0])
                        remove_list.append(j)
                    else:
                        j[1] = 0
                for k in remove_list:
                    work_set.remove(k)
            else:
                print("Will not delete")
            
            print("Add Page %d"%i)
            work_set.append([i,0])
            last_time = access_time
        c = ""
        for i in work_set:
            c = c + " " + str(i)
        print("Now Work Set: %s"%c)
        print("------Access End------\n")
        access_time = access_time + 1
    
    print("Hit time: %d access time: %d Hit rate: %s"%(hit_time, access_time, str(float(hit_time) / access_time)))

选择“3：缺页率置换算法”的同学，请在此处回复。

python3实现：

phypageframesize = 4
addrList = [2,0,3,1,4,1,0,1,2,3]

def lookForPages():
	memory = []		# include pages in memory
	cnt = 0			# current visit time
	dict_ref = {}	# last ref-time of pages
	miss = 0		# page-fault time
	for nStr in addrList:
		cnt += 1
		print("[%d]look for page[%d]"%(cnt,nStr))
		if(not nStr in memory):	# page fault
			miss += 1
			print("page fault[%d]"%miss)
			if(len(memory) < phypageframesize):	# add a page directly
				memory.append(nStr)
			else:	# need to swap out a pages
				# find the idx with smallest ref-time in dict_ref
				# (so it hasn't been visit for the longest time)
				min = 100
				for idx in range(len(memory)):
					if(dict_ref[memory[idx]] < min):
						idx_final = idx
						min = dict_ref[memory[idx]]
				# replace the page at idx_final by the new page
				memory[idx_final] = nStr
		# update the last-ref-time of nStr
		dict_ref[nStr] = cnt
		
		print("\nmemory:")
		for page in memory:
			print("page[%d] last-ref[%d]"%(page, dict_ref[page]))
		print()
	print("Total: %d, miss: %d"%(len(addrList), miss))

if __name__ == '__main__':
	lookForPages()

python2实现

import sys

page_list = []
time = 0
page_fault_num = 0

def info_page_list():
for page in page_list:
    print "\tPage NO: %d, Last use: %d" % (page['NO'], page['time'])

def hit(pos):
    global time
    global page_fault_num
    page_list[pos]['time'] = time
print "time: %d" % time
    time += 1
    print "page hit! hit page %d, total page fault num: %d" % (page_list[pos]['NO'], page_fault_num)
    info_page_list()

def swap(pos, page_NO):
    global time
    global page_fault_num
    swap_out_page = page_list[pos]['NO']
    page_list[pos]['NO'] = page_NO
    page_list[pos]['time'] = time
print "time: %d" % time
    time += 1
    print "page fault! swap out page %d, swap in page %d, total page fault num: %d" % (swap_out_page, page_NO, page_fault_num)
    info_page_list()

def find_page(page_NO):
    length = len(page_list)
    pos = 0
    earliest_use = -1
    for i in range(length):
        if page_list[i]['NO'] == page_NO:
            hit(i)
            return
        if (earliest_use == -1) or (earliest_use > page_list[i]['time']):
            pos = i
            earliest_use = page_list[i]['time']
    global page_fault_num
    global time
    page_fault_num += 1
    if length < page_list_size:
        page_list.append({'NO': page_NO, 'time': time})
    print "time: %d" % time
        print "page fault! load page %d, total page fault num: %d" % (page_NO, page_fault_num)
        info_page_list()
        time += 1
    else:
        swap(pos, page_NO)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    page_list_size = int(sys.argv[1])
    page_fault_num = 0
    page_to_feed = [1, 2, 3, 4, 1, 5, 6, 3, 2, 5]
    for i in range(len(page_to_feed)):
        find_page(page_to_feed[i])

history.content:
根据你的`学号 mod 4`的结果值，确定选择四种页面置换算法（0：LRU置换算法，1:改进的clock 页置换算法，2：工作集页置换算法，3：缺页率置换算法）中的一种来设计一个应用程序（可基于python, ruby, C, C++，LISP等）模拟实现，并给出测试用例和测试结果。请参考如python代码或独自实现。
